TapHunter - San Diego, CA

TapHunter helps people find their favorite craft beer, spirits and cocktails while helping bars and restaurants streamline their operations and market the great beverages they serve.

We are looking to add a junior developer to our two person development team. This person should have passion for their local craft breweries and distilleries and is interested in growing as our company grows. You will work on everything from our mobile application, operational tools for bars and our consumer website. Our stack is Python and Django on Appengine and our mobile app is written with JavaScript on Titanium.

This is an full-time onsite position in our downtown San Diego office.

For a view into our culture and team, see: https://gettaphunter.com/story/

Please apply for this job on Workable: http://taphunter.workable.com/jobs/31725
